title: Ad Valorem Tax Revenue in Fiscally Constrained Counties
subject: taxation and finance

abstracts.abstract: Ad Valorem Tax Revenue in Fiscally Constrained Counties;  Requires Legislature to appropriate funds for specified purpose; requires that such funds be distributed in specified manner; requires specified counties to apply for such distribution; provides requirements for application; provides specified calculation to be used to determine funding; provides for reversion of funds in specified circumstances.
